hubris:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
hubris:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand, NL then draw that many cards. NL Purge.

hubris:PotOfGreed.NAME: Pot of Greed
hubris:PotOfGreed.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Permanently add a Greed to your deck.

hubris:Greed.NAME: Greed
hubris:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain an additional 5 gold at the end of combat for each Greed in your deck. NL Inescapable.
